kafka
*****


Description
===========

Use Oracle Streaming with Apache Kafka Control Plane CLI to
create/update/delete managed Kafka clusters.


Available Commands
==================

* cluster

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * disable-superuser

  * enable-superuser

  * get

  * list

  * list-node-shapes

  * update

* cluster-config

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* cluster-config-version

  * delete

  * get

  * list

* work-request

  * cancel

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list-work-request-logs
